text: @realDonaldTrump Nope. Cuz it’s not true. Everyone appears to live rent free in your head. Between tweeting, golfing, rallys, criming, photo ops & ignoring the Covid19 pandemic. We can all bear witness u have plenty of time on your hands to handle litigation & congressional testimonies😃👍
